about.heading: Building real-world business solutions
paragraphs: Hello! I'm a passionate Software Engineer and DevOps enthusiast, currently working as an SRE (Site Reliability Engineer). Hailing from Dang, Deukhuri, I combine a deep love for coding, systems reliability, and automation with a creative spirit fueled by football and music. I strive to build scalable, efficient, and resilient systems that bridge development and operations seamlessly.

categories.title: DevOps & SRE
skills: CI/CD Pipelines, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI

items.title: Software Engineer
description: Implementing SRE best practices to enhance system reliability and performance.
Monitoring system health and performance using Prometheus and Grafana, ensuring high availability.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve technical challenges efficiently.
Participating in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions to foster a culture of continuous learning.
Staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to drive innovation within the team.

items.title: SRE-Monitoring-Stack
items.description: A containerized observability pipeline that uses HAProxy for load balancing, Prometheus to scrape and store performance metrics via the HAProxy Exporter, and Grafana to visualize real-time health, traffic, and error data.

items.title: e-Sewa Stores
items.description: A full-stack e-commerce application featuring an Angular frontend for a dynamic user interface and a Java (Spring Boot) backend, integrated with the eSewa SDK/API to handle secure digital payments, transaction verification, and order lifecycle management.

items.title: Blue-Green-FastApi-Dev
items.description: A blue-green deployment strategy for FastAPI applications using Docker and Nginx. This setup allows seamless switching between two identical production environments (blue and green) to minimize downtime during updates, ensuring high availability and reliability.

contact.heading: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm currently open to freelance and contract-based work. If you have a project in mind, let's talk!
